overview: This is a collection of Chuck Jones directed animations of Rudyard Kipling stories originally released as TV shorts.  The collection includes Rikki-Tiki-Tavi, Mowgli's Brothers, and the White Seal.  In  Rikki-Tiki-Tavi a young mongoose protects his human family from two murderous cobras.  In Mowgli's Brothers, based on the Kipling story that was also the basis for the Disney's movie Jungle Book, a feral child raised by jungle wolves eventually saves his wolf parents from a tiger's influence on the pack.
tagline: Chuck Jones animations of  Rudyard Kipling stories
title: Rikki-Tikki-Tavi: The Chuck Jones Collection
